column3: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at the Qualls Funeral Home Chapel in Cave City with Lennie Finney officiating. Burial will follow in the Collins Cemetery located at Wirth with arrangements by Qualls Funeral Home of Cave City.  Visitation will be Sunday
